name: (The Honest Jam V) Survival Concept
description:
Busy life as I am working IRL full days so unsure if I can develop this further for the jam.

I EXPLORED a survival game concept with hunger, toxicity levels, and growth as you eat things.

You can EXPLORE from screen to screen and just eat and bump into stuff to attack.

Accessibility aspect would be the simplistic controls, you just point with mouse and hold down LMB to apply motion to your character.

Made in Game Maker 2.

Product released "as is" at the current state it was in. Definitely no bugs in it! But also content is very limited.
